## Welcome!

Hello, I am Eli Della Bitta. I am very interested in data science and using R to create models and quickly analyze data. Outside of the classroom, I love to play baseball, golf, pickleball, and go to the beach. Look around my website to learn more!

## About This Website

This website showcases my data science projects and analyses. You can find the R code for this website in my [GitHub repository](https://github.com/Elde15/myrepo).
